item.title: Anthropic 的新人工智能模型让用户决定它的推理程度
item.description:
OpenAI的竞争对手希望简化用户体验，并重新思考人们何时真正需要人工智能系统来模仿人类的推理能力。【原文：

The OpenAI rival wants to simplify the user experience and rethink when people actually need AI systems to mimic human reasoning.

】

item.title: 丹尼餐厅为应对供应短缺增加鸡蛋附加费
item.description: 丹尼公司（Denny's Corp.）表示，由于供应紧张导致鸡蛋价格飙升，一些分店将暂时对含鸡蛋的餐点加收附加费。【原文：Denny’s Corp. said some locations will temporarily add a surcharge to meals with eggs due to a supply crunch that has led to a surge in prices.】

item.title: 美国买家将承受特朗普关税，铝材继续流通
item.description: 迫在眉睫的铝关税让美国从罐头到汽车的制造商们惶恐不安。但是，只要他们愿意支付足够的溢价，金属就有可能继续流经北部边境。【原文：Looming aluminum tariffs have put US makers of everything from cans to cars on edge. But as long as they’re willing to pay enough of a premium, the metal is likely to continue flowing across the northern border.】

item.title: 捷克总理敦促增加国防开支，修改欧盟财政规则
item.description: 捷克总理彼得-菲亚拉（Petr Fiala）表示，捷克需要在未来几年内将国防开支提高到至少占经济产出的 3%，并呼吁欧盟修改其财政规则以允许此类投资。【原文：Czech Prime Minister Petr Fiala said his country will need to boost defense spending to at least 3% of economic output over the next few years, calling on the European Union to overhaul its fiscal rules to allow such investment.】

item.title: 战略公司最新可转换债券引发加密货币疲劳话题
item.description: 上周，迈克尔-赛勒（Michael Saylor）的战略公司（Strategy）在一笔可转换债务交易中筹集了 20 亿美元，这似乎是快速出售股票挂钩票据以资助加密货币购买的公司取得的又一次胜利。在标题数字的背后，Strate 公司增加交易条件的举动发出了一个不同的信号：与加密货币相关的票据市场已接近饱和。【原文：When Michael Saylor’s Strategy raised $2 billion in a convertible debt deal last week, it seemed like another triumph for firms rapidly selling equity-linked notes to fund cryptocurrency purchases. Behind the headline number, Strategy’s move to sweeten the deal’s terms sent a different signal: the market for crypto-related paper is nearing saturation.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利称，美元的衰退之路与 2017 年的暴跌遥相呼应
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）称，在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）第一个任期开始时对美元造成重创的因素，在 2025 年将再次威胁到美国货币。【原文：Factors that slammed the dollar at the start of Donald Trump’s first term are threatening the US currency again in 2025, according to Morgan Stanley.】

item.title: 如果特朗普就大型科技规则采取行动，欧盟誓言迅速回应
item.description: 继美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对欧盟的技术规则发出最新警告后，欧盟委员会表示，如果美国总统采取任何 "不合理的措施"，欧盟委员会将 "迅速果断地 "做出回应。【原文：The European Commission said it would respond “swiftly and decisively” if US President Donald Trump takes any “unjustified measures” following his latest warning over the bloc’s tech rules.】

item.title: 贝森特与国会共和党人启动减税谈判
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）和国会领导人将开始每周会晤，因为共和党人希望在年底截止日期前制定减税方案。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent and congressional leaders will begin meeting weekly as Republicans look to shape a tax cut package with a year-end deadline, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 保加利亚寻求欧盟评估，这是采用欧元的关键一步
item.description: 保加利亚将于明年初请求欧盟对其加入欧元区的准备情况进行评估，这凸显了保加利亚政府向单一货币迈进的决心。【原文：Bulgaria is set to request the European Union’s assessment on its readiness to join the euro area early next year, highlighting the government’s determination to move toward the single currency.】

item.title: 特朗普上台后，Citadel Securities 计划涉足加密货币交易
item.description: 肯-格里芬（Ken Griffin）的做市商巨头 Citadel Securities 正寻求成为加密货币的流动性提供商，并打赌唐纳德-特朗普总统对该行业的支持将为该资产类别带来繁荣。【原文：Ken Griffin’s market-making giant Citadel Securities is looking to become a liquidity provider for cryptocurrencies, betting President Donald Trump’s embrace of the industry will usher in a boom for the asset class.】

item.title: 津巴布韦企业为 ZiG 下的恶性通货膨胀会计工作做好准备
item.description: 津巴布韦的市场监管机构正在寻求央行明确新的规则，这些规则将要求公司以该国的黄金支持货币报告其财务报表，从而迫使它们采用恶性通货膨胀会计方法并增加经营成本。【原文：Zimbabwe’s market regulator is seeking clarity from the central bank on new rules that would require companies to report their financial statements in the nation’s gold-backed currency, forcing them to adopt hyperinflationary accounting and increase the cost of doing business.】

item.title: 企业涌入债券市场，创本月第二大交易日
item.description: 周一，十多家公司将出售投资级债券，此前收益率在过去一周有所下降，公司债券需求依然强劲。【原文：More than a dozen companies are selling investment-grade bonds Monday, after yields have fallen over the last week and demand for corporate debt has remained strong.】

item.title: 阿布扎比 ENEC 公司有意投资核电专家 Newcleo 公司
item.description: 在阿联酋总统访问罗马期间签署了一项协议之后，阿布扎比国营原子能公司将对法国-意大利运营商 Newcleo 进行投资。【原文：Abu Dhabi’s state-run atomic power company is set to invest in French-Italian operator Newcleo after signing an accord during a visit to Rome by the United Arab Emirates’ president.】

item.title: 墨西哥研究对中国征收关税以求与特朗普达成协议
item.description: 墨西哥正在权衡对中国进口商品征收关税的可能性，因为墨西哥正在推动达成一项协议，以避免美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁在 3 月初的最后期限之前对墨西哥商品征收 25% 的关税。【原文：Mexico is weighing possible levies on Chinese imports as it pushes for a deal to avoid the 25% tariffs that President Donald Trump has threatened to impose on its goods before a deadline in early March.】

item.title: 特朗普命令激起中国贸易焦虑，阿里巴巴股价暴跌
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的最新行政命令引发了对中美贸易紧张局势深化的担忧，阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd）股价周一在美股交易中暴跌。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd shares tumbled in US trading on Monday as President Donald Trump’s latest executive order stirred fears about deepening trade tensions between the US and China.】

item.title: 卡塔尔液化天然气货运因天然气价格下滑而远离欧洲
item.description: 卡塔尔的一批液化天然气货物改道驶离欧洲，因为该地区近期价格下跌后，一些贸易商在其他地方寻求更具吸引力的销售。【原文：A liquefied natural gas cargo from Qatar diverted away from Europe as some traders seek more attractive sales elsewhere after a recent drop in the region’s prices.】

item.title: 南非卡加亚戈称特朗普的不确定性桎梏全球经济
item.description: 南非央行行长警告说，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的政策冲击下，全球经济面临分裂的风险。【原文：The global economy is at risk of splintering under US President Donald Trump’s policy onslaught, the head of South Africa’s central bank warned.】

item.title: 肯尼亚计划发行新欧洲债券回购 9 亿美元证券
item.description: 肯尼亚计划出售新的美元债券，为回购 2027 年到期的 9 亿美元欧元债券提供资金。【原文：Kenya plans to sell new dollar bonds to finance the repurchase of $900 million eurobonds due in 2027.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德寻求为基础设施基金筹资 70 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）正寻求为其第四个基础设施债务基金筹集至少 70 亿美元。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management is seeking to raise at least $7 billion for its fourth infrastructure debt fund, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Blackstone 以 56.5 亿美元收购超级游艇和游艇码头服务商
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 的一个部门同意以 56.5 亿美元的价格收购一家游艇码头和游艇服务企业，押注美国游艇爱好者。【原文：A unit of Blackstone Inc. agreed to acquire a marina and yacht servicing business for $5.65 billion in a bet on US boaters.】

item.title: 尼尔-杜塔认为劳动力市场风险上升
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 伍德集团确认 Sidara 的新收购意向
item.description: 约翰-伍德集团（John Wood Group Plc）证实，该公司已收到工程公司 Sidara 提出的新收购要约，而去年双方曾有过一次接触，但最终未能达成交易。【原文：John Wood Group Plc confirmed that it has received a fresh takeover offer from engineering company Sidara, after a previous approach last year ended without a deal.】

item.title: 穆迪下调评级后塞内加尔美元债券下跌
item.description: 穆迪投资者服务公司（Moody's Investors Service）将塞内加尔的主权信用评级进一步下调至垃圾级后，该国的美元债券周一下跌。【原文：Senegal’s dollar bonds fell on Monday after Moody’s Investors Service downgraded the country’s sovereign credit ratings further into junk territory.】

item.title: 英国提供更多现金支持格兰杰茅斯炼油厂转型
item.description: 英国增加了对苏格兰格兰杰茅斯炼油厂向低碳未来转型的潜在财政支持。【原文：The UK has increased potential financial support for the transition of the Grangemouth oil refinery in Scotland to a low-carbon future.】

item.title: 南非采取行动限制不断攀升的医疗服务收费
item.description: 南非正在采取措施限制医疗费用，因为该国大多数人都负担不起不断上涨的医疗费用。【原文：South Africa is taking steps to cap health-care costs as it grapples with rising medical charges that most of the country can’t afford.】

item.title: 以色列将利率维持在 4.5%，等待通胀放缓
item.description: 以色列连续第九次会议维持利率不变，央行等待战争引发的通胀放缓后再启动宽松周期。【原文：Israel kept interest rates on hold for a ninth-straight meeting, with the central bank waiting for war-induced inflation to slow before starting an easing cycle.】

item.title: Hims & Hers 的 458% 涨幅因 FDA 削弱肥胖症销售而受到考验
item.description: Hims&Hers Health Inc.的迅猛涨势令备忘录股票交易者着迷，但这一涨势已经停止，这为这家远程医疗公司在周一收盘后公布财报时面临关键考验埋下了伏笔。【原文：The blistering rally in Hims & Hers Health Inc. that’s captivated meme-stock traders has ground to a halt, setting up a pivotal test when the telehealth company reports earnings after the market closes Monday.】

item.title: 蓝猫头鹰降低欧洲私人信贷早期投资者的费用
item.description: Blue Owl Capital 正在免除其一只基金的一大笔费用，以吸引欧洲投资者进入私人信贷领域。【原文：Blue Owl Capital is waiving a large chunk of fees on one of its funds to attract European investors into private credit.】

item.title: Robinhood 称美国证券交易委员会在未执法的情况下结束加密货币调查
item.description: Robinhood Markets 公司称，美国证券交易委员会结束了对该公司加密货币业务的调查，不会采取任何执法行动。【原文：Robinhood Markets Inc. said the US Securities and Exchange Commission closed an investigation into the firm’s cryptocurrency operations and isn’t pursuing any enforcement action.】

item.title: 阿根廷财政部长缺席二十国集团南非会议
item.description: 继美国代表团做出类似决定后，阿根廷经济部长路易斯-卡普托（Luis Caputo）成为最新一位缺席在南非举行的二十国集团财政部长会议的经济部长。【原文：Argentina’s Luis Caputo is the latest economy minister to skip a meeting of G-20 finance chiefs in South Africa, following a similar decision by the US delegation.】
